message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. How about we start at $9,500?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $8,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $8,000 is just too low for me.  Perhaps we could meet in the middle? How about $9,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still committed to keeping my expenses within my budget. Would it be possible to reach an agreement at $8,500?
